Text: You are sitting in your office at the end of a long day.

Speaker: You
Text: *Sigh* I don't know what to do anymore.

Speaker: You
Text: Its been long past the 2 months I had to make this branch stand on top of the industry.

Speaker: You
Text: Yet here I am| pretty much exactly where I started.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: Hello| you've been here for plenty long and I have yet to see any major improvement.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: I don't need to hear it| I just want results.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: Seeing as how you haven't exactly failed the branch either| I'm willing to let you keep trying.

Speaker: John Bossman
Text: Next time| I won't be so nice.

Speaker: You
Text: Alright then| thanks for the opportunity.
